module: Module-level comment: The 'lfsr' module implements a 4-bit Linear Feedback Shift Register generating pseudo-random sequences. On each clock cycle, 'data_out' updates, shifting right and injecting a feedback 'next_bit' from an XOR of the two least significant bits, unless 'reset' is active or 'data_out' is zero, in which case 'data_out' resets to 1.
